name: test_12_1_0_View_All_Communities
description:
Test Case 224: Verify Community Groups Visibility in CMS

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Verify visibility of all community groups
5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 224: Verify Community Groups Visibility in CMS

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
  4. Verify visibility of all community groups
  5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)

@allure.feature("12.0.0 CMS Communities") @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing") @allure.story("12.1.0 View All Communities") @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL) @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-224", name="Qase: NAF-224") @allure.description(""" Test Case 224: Verify Community Groups Visibility in CMS Test Steps: 1. Launch the browser 2. Login as admin user 3. Navigate to Postpartum community page 4. Verify visibility of all community groups 5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum) """) def test_12_1_0_View_All_Communities(): with BrowserManager() as page: # Login using the existing login class login_page = LoginPage(page) login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw) # Navigate to the Postpartum community page community_page = CommunityPage(page) community_page.go_to_postpartum_community() # Verify the visibility of all community groups community_page.verify_communities_visibility() #
